channel.title: ComputerSphere API Endpoints
channel.description: Overview of ComputerSphere API endpoints for AI agent understanding

item.title: GET /projects
item.description: Retrieve all projects accessible to the user. Returns a list of projects.

item.title: GET /environments
item.description: Retrieve environments linked to a specific project by project_id query parameter.

item.title: GET /notifications
item.description: Fetch latest notifications sent to the user. Optionally limit by size query parameter.

item.title: GET /notifications/settings
item.description: View notification preferences and settings. Optionally limit results by size query parameter.

item.title: PUT /notifications/settings
item.description: Update email notification preferences. Requires JSON body with email_enabled boolean and emails list.

item.title: GET /services
item.description: Retrieve services associated with a specified project via project_id query parameter.

item.title: GET /users/projects
item.description: Retrieve list of projects assigned to the user.
